data.name: BagOfMushrooms
data.value: Allows you to pick a mushroom to consume every 180 seconds. White Shroom: Increases the speed of the game by 40%. Yellow Shroom: Generates 20 soul per second but causes nausea. Red Shroom: Gives you 4 extra health, heals you fully, and increases your nail damage by 20%, but you can't dash. Green Shroom: Makes you small, decreases gravity by 50%, and doubles all damage taken. Picking the same mushroom twice in a row nerfs its positive effect by 50%. Picking the same mushroom three times in a row deals 2 damage to you instead. Press quick map to select another and cdash + dash to consume the mushroom.

data.name: BestMenderInTheWorld
data.value: Menderbug asked Mender Berri out and she said, "Yes!" ^-^ Most signs in this kingdom are now unbreakable and grant a small amount of geo when hit. Additionally, Menderbug always appears at the sign. <3

data.name: BlessingOfTheButterfly
data.value: Wings now deal 12 damage upon contact with an enemy, apply massive knockback downwards, and give you slightly more height. While your double jump is on cooldown, you deal 4 damage to enemies below you instead of taking damage from them. You regain soul and automatically jump again. (This does not restore wings.)

data.name: Camouflage
data.value: After standing still for 5 seconds, you gain invincibility until you do something. If you are wearing Shape of Unn, you keep the invincibility while focusing and moving as a slug.

data.name: CaringShell
data.value: Environment hazards (like spikes) don't deal damage to you anymore.

data.name: ConcussiveStrike
data.value: Great Slash and Dash Slash cause Concussion on their target for 3 seconds. Concussed enemies take 10% more damage from nail attacks and increase their knockback by 50% (66% with Heavy Blow). Nail hits on the target extend the duration by 0.5 seconds each. Cyclone Slash is not counted as a nail slash in this case. This also causes enemies to glance 50% of their hits decreasing their damage by 1.

data.name: DeliciousMeal
data.value: You can consume a rancid egg: for 3 minutes you heal 1 mask every 8 seconds and gain a +20% damage buff. Press jump to consume the egg.

data.name: DiamondCore
data.value: Crystal Heart stuns all enemies in the room if you hit a wall. The cdash damage and the duration of the stun increase with the duration of the cdash. (Stun duration is capped at 10 seconds. You gain 5 damage and 10% speed per second. You gain invincibility after 3 seconds.)

data.name: DiamondDash
data.value: Crystal Heart is cast 0.3 seconds faster and can be held midair while pressing up. This is doubled if you have Diamond Core unlocked. Drains 20 soul per second (or 10 if you have Diamond Core).

data.name: DiminishingCurse
data.value: If you take 10 hits, you will no longer count as overcharmed. This resets if you sit on a bench. The UI only updates if you open the charm screen.

data.name: DramaticEntrance
data.value: Heals you to full health and soul upon entering a boss fight. If you have Joni's Blessing equipped, you will be granted up to 8 lifeblood masks instead. In Godhome, these effects are heavily weakened.

data.name: DreamBlessing
data.value:
When defeated, Dreamers grant the Dream Nail an additional effect. (This is doubled with Awoken Dream Nail.)
Lurien: roots the target for 3 seconds with a 15 second cooldown.
Herrah: spawn 2 Weavers.
Monomon: for each 100 Essence, you have a 1% chance to instant kill the enemy. This is capped at 2400 Essence for a 24% chance. (Actual damage cap is 125.)

data.name: ElderbugHitList
data.value: When entering a new room marks a random enemy with a red outline. If you kill that enemy FIRST another one gets marked. If all enemies are killed in the right order you receive a soul vessel fragment, mask shard, charm notch, 200 geo, or a small damage buff.

data.name: EternalSentinel
data.value: Defender's Crest clouds are 150% bigger and tick twice as fast. Baldur Shell now takes 7 hits instead of 4 (10 with Defender's Crest). While wearing Defender's Crest with Baldur Shell up, you gain 15 soul when hit.

data.name: EternalValor
data.value: You heal 1 mask for every 12 hits on enemies. Going 3 seconds without hitting an enemy will reduce your total by 1 per 0.5 seconds.

data.name: EyeOfTheWatcher
data.value: Grants the lantern effect. If you already have the lantern effect and would take lethal damage, you will be healed to full health instead. With Joni's Blessing, you gain 5 lifeblood instead. Once triggered, this effect can be restored by looking through the telescope by Lurien.

data.name: FlowerRing
data.value: Increase the damage of your Nail Arts by 10% for each recipient of the Delicate Flower.

data.name: FollowTheLight
data.value: While casting Dream Nail, holding Left will spawn an orange portal by your side which allows travel from anywhere in the room. Holding Right will warp you to that portal. (Requires Dream Gate.) Warping will consume 1 essence and the portal. Neither will be consumed with Awoken Dream Nail as the portal will swap position with you instead.

data.name: FriendOfTheJellyfish
data.value: You're immune to jellyfishs enemies and explosions. Note: Non Jellyfish explosion enemies, "could" still deal 2 damage on contact. You're just immune to the explosion itself.

data.name: GiftOfUnn
data.value: Gain the Shape of Unn effect. If you're wearing Shape of Unn, Focus restores 15 soul on a successful cast.

data.name: GloryOfTheWealth
data.value: Enemies drop double Geo. Press Quick Map + Up to become invincible. For each second this is active, it drains 1 additional Geo. Press Quick Map + Down or leave the room to cancel the effect. While the effect is inactive, the cost decreases by 1 every 5 seconds (or every 2.5 seconds if you have Fragile/Unbreakable Greed equipped).

data.name: GraspOfLife
data.value: While running on the ground spawn a grass patch each second. Every 10th one is "pale grass" which, upon destroying, causes all other spawned grass by you to cast wraith that deal 10 damage (20 if shape of unn is equipped). Grass despawns after 10 seconds.

data.name: GrassBombardement
data.value: Pressing left while casting. spawns a bomb which explodes after 3 seconds, that deals 40 damage (60 with shaman stone) and breaks damaged walls/ground. Pressing right, will consume a lifeblood mask to spawn a more powerful bomb, with a bigger radius, 50 % more damage and the ability to break ALL damaged floors/walls in the room, even heavy floors and one way walls.

data.name: GreaterMind
data.value: Activates a tracker which shows you how many powers you are missing. If the counter is green, you have global access to the powers in that area. (Look in the Mod Menu for more options.)

data.name: HappyFate
data.value: After sitting on a bench, your nail damage, nail range, running speed, dash speed and cdash charge up speed is increased. You also gain 1 soul per second.

data.name: HotStreak
data.value: When hitting an enemy with the nail, increases it's damage by 1 (max. 3 stacks per nail upgrade (15 total)). Resets if you don't hit an enemy.

data.name: Imposter
data.value: While wearing spore shrooms, focus has a 20% chance to add a lifeblood (doesn't work if you have 3 or more lifeblood).

data.name: Infested
data.value: Hitting an enemy with the nail plants an egg to the enemy (Capped at 5), which spawns a weaver once the enemy died. Weavers also apply eggs (Capped at 25). Weavers despawn after 20 seconds or upon leaving the room.

data.name: JellyBelly
data.value: Decrease your falling speed by about 20% and triples the time needed in air, for a hard fall.

data.name: JellyfishFlow
data.value: You swim 4 times as fast.

data.name: JonisProtection
data.value: When going to another area, you will be granted 5 life blood (10 if you have Joni's equipped). Each 3 seconds a lifeblood granted by this ability will fade away.

data.name: LaughableThreat
data.value: Most non boss enemies will not be triggered by line of sight. This effect fades away once you hit any enemy. Refreshes on entering a new room.

data.name: LifebloodOmen
data.value: Spawns a grimmkin every 180 seconds. Killing the ghost grants 3/6/9 lifeblood (based on ghost level). The ghost disappears if you leave the room or if 90 seconds passed. The chances for the ghost adjust based on your current nail level. I'll will not list the chances here. Look at the repository, if you want to know.

data.name: MantisStyle
data.value: Increase your nail range by 50% (from base).

data.name: MarissasAudience
data.value: After 45 to 120 seconds spawn multiple companions (Weavers, Hatchlings, Grimmchilds) that persist in the current room or for 30 to 90 seconds. If Marissa is dead, spawns Revek each 45 to 120 seconds, that persist in the current room or 20 to 90 seconds.

data.name: MaskOvercharge
data.value: Overcharge one of your mask (it glows in different colors), while you have exactly that much health, a circle gathers around you that deal damage and restore 8 soul each second. The overcharged mask changes every 30 seconds and may never select the full hp mask. Inactive while you have Joni's Blessing equipped.

data.name: MindblastOfUnn
data.value: Hitting an enemy with the dream nail permanently increases the taken damage by 2. Bonus for wearing charm: +1 Dreamwielder, +2 Dreamshield and +3 Shape of Unn. The effect is doubled with awoken dream nail.

data.name: OneOfUs
data.value: Every twelve seconds you cast the deep focus spore cloud. Hold the crystal dash button to prevent that (in case you want to do pogos for example).

data.name: OverwhelmingPower
data.value: When you cast a spell while your soul vessel is full (not counting additional soul vessels), they deal twice as much damage and are twice as big. Has a 10% chance to deal 2 mask of damage and limit your soul vessel for 30 to 120 seconds, after casting an overpowered spell.

data.name: PaleLuck
data.value: When you would take damage, you have a 2% chance to be healed instead. Increased by 4% for each King's Brand and Kingssoul. Also increased by 1 % for each king's idol you have.

data.name: PureSpirit
data.value: If you have 0 soul after casting a spell you will gain an rotating orb around you that deals 2 contact damage (4 with shamans), up to 3 at a time. If you have 3 orbs active, the next fireball will attach the orbs to it, let them explode upon contact with enemies for 20 damage and restore 10 soul. Soul Snatcher and Soul Eater will increase the soul gained by the orb. Shaman Stone will increase the orb explosion damage.

data.name: QueenThorns
data.value: Thorns of Agony are now "Queen Thorns", which removes the freeze on hit. restore soul if it hits an enemy and has a 33% chance to restore 1 hp if it kills an enemy.

data.name: RelentlessSwarm
data.value: Hits with flukes restore 2 soul, or 5 if the enemy died.

data.name: ReluctantPilgrim
data.value: While standing of the ground, the grubberfly elegy effect is active regardless of your hp (Joni conditions are still normal). If you have grubberfly equipped, the damage on ground is doubled instead. Also mutes the beams after a few casts.

data.name: Requiem
data.value: Holding focus, while you dying will spawn you in dirtmouth instead of your bench. Holding dream nail will spawn you at spirit's glade instead (when the glade is open). Holding Crystal Dash will spawn you at Hallownests Crown (?), requires Crystal Heart to work.

data.name: ReturnToUnn
data.value: Your Movement speed is increased by 3 and your dash cooldown is reduces by 0.5 seconds, while you facing left.

data.name: SacredShell
data.value: You can longer take more than one damage per hit (excluding overcharmed).

data.name: ScrewTheRules
data.value: Fury of the Fallen is now also active with 2 hp, but the damage buff is decreased to 50%. Grubberfly Beams are only nerfed by 40%.

data.name: ShadowForged
data.value: Decrease the cooldown of shade cloak by 0.2 seconds and increases sharp shadow damage by 100%.

data.name: ShiningBound
data.value: For each charm you're wearing, you gain 1 soul per 2 seconds.

data.name: SoulExtractEfficiency
data.value: You gain 5 more soul per hit on enemies and your extra soul vessel soul will be added instantly to be used for spells after casting spell. This does NOT affect focus, unless you do the wind up again.

data.name: StagAdoption
data.value: Using the stag egg on the lore power page spawns a small stag that can bring you to any opened stag station. After using it, the egg respawns after 5 minutes in the stag nest.

data.name: TouchGrass
data.value: Every 8 seconds standing on grass, you heal 1 mask. Decreased to 4 seconds if wearing Shape of Unn.

data.name: Tourist
data.value: You can talk to the firefly to the right to teleport to black egg temple for 50 geo, or back to this room from the temple.

data.name: TreasureHunter
data.value: Obtained treasure (via the treasure charts that you can purchase at iselda with Lemm's Order) grant you their effect. Special Relics: Increase the amount of geo that Lemm gives you with each relic by 50%. Magic Key: Opens all locked doors and other mechanisms besides Toll and the Lifeblood Door. Medallion: Increase the chance for an essence drop upon an enemys death to 10% (20% with Dreamwielder)

data.name: TrueForm
data.value: While your shade is active, you deal 30% more damage and increase your nail length by 25%. The effects are doubled, if you are in the same room as your shade.

data.name: UnitedWeStand
data.value: Weavers are bigger, Grimmchild shoots faster and Hatchling deal more damage for each companion (of those three) you have.

data.name: WeDontTalkAboutShade
data.value: You don't get the soul limit punishment, when dying. Your geo will still be on the shade. When dying while the shade is active, your shade only loose 50% of your geo.

data.name: WellFocused
data.value: Focus is cast 30% faster.

data.name: WisdomOfTheSage
data.value: For each Mr. Mushroom stage that you completed, spells cost 1 soul less.

data.name: YouLikeJazz
data.value: You can now have 10 hatchlings at a time, they spawn twice at fast and cost only 25% of their normal soul.
